fields.title: STAY AWAY, DANGER, BEWARE! or COME THIS WAY!
fields.content:
A lighthouse emitting red and green messages illuminates the sky surrounding the island of Svartklubben. The light compass across the horizon of the Sea of Åland and the northern archipelago of Stockholm. Since 1819, this beacon of hope has warned mariners of dangerous shallows and perilous rocky coasts, guiding vessels safely into and out of harbours. It’s a place where time stands still, a place to contemplate, to get inspired, and a place very dear to my heart.

Svartklubben FM is a music blog serving as a guiding light through cyberspace, leading music enthusiasts with frequently updated playlists curated to fit specific moods and monthly highlights that celebrate a wide range of music genres. Svartklubben FM is dedicated to promoting music discovery and to shine a light on tunes beyond the mainstream charts.﻿
